name: Television
description: 1. A television is an electronic device that displays video and audio content.
2. It is designed to be stationary and cannot move on its own.
3. It can be turned on or off by pressing a button by an agent, but it can not be turned on by itself.
4. Its status can change from displaying content to being on standby mode when not in use.
5. TVs can automatically switch to different inputs when detecting a signal from a connected device.
6. Some smart TVs can update their software and apps without human intervention.
7. Screen size, resolution, and sound quality are important characteristics of a television.
8. A television should be used in appropriate lighting conditions and at a reasonable volume to reduce eye strain and hearing damage.
